entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He had an impression that Lupin wanted to leave quickly.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who wants to leave as quickly as possible. He shakes hands with Dumbledore and leaves the office.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who stays in the office after Lupin leaves. He talks to Harry about his feelings and accomplishments.

relationships.description: Lupin left the office, leaving Harry behind.
Dumbledore talked to Harry about his feelings and accomplishments.
